===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[stick out]]; to [[straighten up]]
#: {{zh-x|挺 起 胸膛|to proudly put one's chest out}}
# to [[endure]]; to [[stand]]
#: {{zh-x|挺 過 這 道 坎兒{r}|to '''persist''' and overcome this hurdle}}
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} [[quite]]; [[rather]]; [[pretty]]
#: {{zh-x|挺 不錯|'''quite''' good}}
#: {{zh-x|挺 可愛|'''quite''' cute}}
# {{lb|zh|colloquial|Taiwan}} [[support]]
#: {{zh-x|我 是 挺 你 的！|I '''support''' you!}}
